website_summaries.verdict: Apple's entry-level 21.5-inch Mac is a solid, basic OS X-equipped all-in-one. It's priced like a midrange desktop, however, and the competition is tough at that level.
pros: Same display and chassis as higher-end Mac desktop models
Two Thunderbolt ports and four USB 3.0 ports
cons: Target display mode only supports Thunderbolt

customer_reviews.title: Really good value Imac
customer_reviews.text: Really good value Imac. I shopped around but for this model this was the best value I could find. The computer itself is as you would expect a thing of beauty and so easy to setup and use. I am particularly liking the Apple keyboard and mouse which are really comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Kent

customer_reviews.title: Looks and performs very nice. I hate the mouse as it doesn't seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and performs very nice. I hate the mouse as it doesn't seem to like any surface you use it on. I was also under the impression that it came with the magic trackpad which is not in the box but shown in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: M Saunders

customer_reviews.title: this is the best product which I have bought
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is the best product which I have bought. The packaging is perfect. And the computer being delivered in a very good state. That item has been delivered in the right time.
customer_reviews.author: camila

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly nervous as this was £184 cheaper than normal but it came amazingly fast and was the latest British version. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Brown

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing computer. It literally took about 10 minutes to ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing computer.It literally took about 10 minutes to set it up. plug in the power cable and youre pretty much ready to go once youve connected wirelessly to wifi and signed in/up with an Apple ID. it runs faster that the speed of sound and is perfect for what i use it for, editing videos, social medias, browsing the web and pretty much everything else. the screen quality is insane, it is so crisp and i found absolutely no faults with it what so ever. highly reccomend this to anyone. the only downside to this of course is the price but i can tell you it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... 11yrs old and still running well) and I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Decided to update my home mac (old one was 11yrs old and still running well) and I'm so glad I did. I love the size, performance, memory, speed and ease of the new mac and the os. Moving some very old programs across proved a little bit difficult but it is so user friendly. All sorted now.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, like Apple always is.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's a mac, so it comes with everything you need in software. Also super quiet, fast and well built. If it will last as long as my previous one (8 years) the I'll be very happy. And you won't find the same deal anywhere else, normally these are a lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: CC Hendriks-Weijde

customer_reviews.title: Great iMac, processing speed is great as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great iMac, processing speed is great as well as the design. The OS X is very easy to use. If possible, upgrade th HD to a Solid Slate, because the HD 5400 rpm can take a few seconds to load any app for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this iMac, even best than the last one. arrived earlier than expected too!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Adrian A Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely powerful iMac.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect machine, nice big screen, good speed. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jay786

customer_reviews.title: A change for the best.
customer_reviews.text: Changed from years of using microsoft windows to this apple os operating system and I love it. So easy to use and brilliantly fast. No going back once you have experienced this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Helier Falle

customer_reviews.title: Lucky Me!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful piece of kit. Getting all the bits out of the box actually took longer than setting it up (which is unbelievably easy). Love my MacBook Air, but the iMac is better if I am using it for longer periods of time. The large screen enables me to work with two PowerPoint presentations at the same time. The Magic Keyboard is a dream to use.
customer_reviews.author: amazing chester

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product and so easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product and so easy to set up and use. I have been a PC man since the start and have recently added the iMac and MacBook Pro to my desk and the adjustments I've had to make in my procedures have been minimal. They are now my main working tools, I keep the PCs as they also have an important role, but the iMac is my main working tool.
customer_reviews.author: ian moutter

customer_reviews.title: I like the bigger screen and I use a windows laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: Its an Apple but there are still features that I miss from Windows. I like the bigger screen and I use a windows laptop or iPad for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Stripes, Scotland

customer_reviews.title: Happy Days !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old iMac which is now eight years old, it's a big improvement and so much faster. I did consider moving away from Apple to a PC but having tried some of the latest offerings it's Apple for me every time, considering that some of the all in one PCs are quite expensive it's worth jumping on the Apple ladder if you can. I'm extremely satisfied with the service from Amazon, ordered Saturday afternoon, received late Sunday morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after the previous Mac I owned had a failed motherboard less than two years after purchase. This Mac is painfully slow at doing anything which involves changing from one app to another and often struggles to load e-mails. My son had loaded a game from the apps store and it keeps freezing on this. You would get a far superior spec Windows machine for the money and that is what I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gully Foyle

customer_reviews.title: good but ruined by El Capitan!
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter than the old one , no disk drive so I bought an external one. still wish they would bring all those usb ports round to the front.dont like this El Capitan but something better may come out in the future, The Siera upgrade is to be avoided. the Disk Utility is awful on Capitan , I was a lover of Mountain Lion but it won't let me go back.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mol

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Next day delivery, excellent protection from packaging, 30 minute hassle free set up, bonus to get the 2.8GHz for the price of the 1.6GHz. As a family we have Samsung tablets, phones, ipads, iphones, PC's , Macbooks, this is the first imac and its gorgeous. Visually not as good as the retina display on Macbooks and the hard drive is not SSD but for the price £899 its excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lakey

customer_reviews.title: They are fantastic, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my wife as I already own one. They are fantastic, not perfect, but still fantastic. I made to change to iMACs six years ago after using windows machines for over twenty years, and I would never go back to windows. iMACs are well made and reliable, my imac is in its sixth year and still like new. A windows machine would have fallen to bits by now, or would be so out of date it would be unsuable. The best windows OS has now gone XP, windows 10 is utter rubbish, thats what my wife's machine was but this new mac blows it away.
customer_reviews.author: Noodles

customer_reviews.title: Another fantastic Apple product.
customer_reviews.text: Superb product. Replaces an older iMac. Do miss the DVD drive which my old device used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Dr PK

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Having moved from Windows to Mac i was a little unsure as to whether I was doing the right thing, but after a very short time I knew I had! - The setup was so easy, just plug in and within 10 minutes I was up and running. Loading is so much faster, it comes loaded with everything i need and I can choose from the App Store if I want anything else. I chose to have the trackpad as well, which is an absolute bonus if you're used to working on laptops. Just wish I'd have invested in one years ago! I Love it! and certainly wouldn't want to go back to Windows now.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: I am having some problems with this IMac. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am having some problems with this IMac. I booked a visit to Apple Store and hope the fix it or Ill send it back to you. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply appalling
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the worst pc I have ever bought. Got this as a replacement to an earlier Mac version. This one is extremely slow, no ability to upgrade freezes constantly. It takes well over a minute just to get to the screen where all my apps are displayed. This is one appalling piece of crap and way way overpriced. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: ig06

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just wish Apple would stop having their products made/assembled in China.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Foenander
